meta.title: About Us | Wheelhouse
meta.description: Learn about Wheelhouse's mission, values, and commitment to excellence in maritime services. Discover our story and expertise.

hero.subtitle: Excellence in maritime services since inception
hero.description: We are committed to providing world-class maritime solutions with a focus on safety, reliability, and innovation.

whoWeAre.title: Who Are We
whoWeAre.desc1: Wheelhouse Co., Ltd is a maritime technology and service provider dedicated to optimizing the performance of ships and fleets.
whoWeAre.desc2: Our strength lies in experienced people who listen, innovate, and deliver tailored solutions.

ourValues.title: Our Value
ourValues.value1: By providing high-quality products and services, we are committed to being a trusted partner, walking alongside our Customers for the long term.
ourValues.value2: In cooperation with Manufacturers, we create a reliable, quality and sustainable network to serve Customers.
ourValues.value3: We create the best conditions to meet the needs and expectations at work in order to promote the creativity, dedication and enthusiasm of Employees, which contributes to the success of Wheelhouse.
ourValues.value4: Wheelhouse actively contributes to the development of the Vietnamese maritime industry and remains aware that social responsibility is an integral part of our commitment to the Community

ourMission.title: Our Mission
ourMission.desc: To be a preferred supplier of “One-stop” solution for marine electronic services, communication and navigation equipment throughout the region, all underpinned by the Wheelhouse values:
ourMission.value1: We conduct business with Honesty & Transparency.
ourMission.value2: We offer equal terms of treatment and Integrity without Prejudice.
ourMission.value3: Our team is characterized by a Desire to Listen & Willingness to Advise.
ourMission.value4: We move forward with an Unapologetically Optimistic View of the Future.
ourMission.value5: While remembering the Responsibilities of Today..

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.name: Wheelhouse Co., Ltd
contact.address: Address: 21 An Loc Str, An Hai Dist, HaiPhong City, Vietnam
